subject: Re: sorry Dave
author: David Hogan
full_text:
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> Dave ,
> Once again I hear nothing but noise in these files. the hello file 
is 
> not evp, it sounds like you paused the recording to answer the phone 
> maybe and caught yourself saying hello.
> 
> I'm going to make my offer again. If you are new to this and want 
some 
> help getting started please e-mail me and I will gladly explain how 
to 
> get successful evp.
> 
> Bruce
>
 Hello, first off you need to know that I am not new to evp's. I have 
been low budget recording for at least 4 years and involved with the 
paranormal for over 30 years. I use a cheap olympus digital recorder 
and am very careful about the conditions i record. There was no " pipe 
banging" and I wasnt anywhere near a telephone All my evp's are " 
real". Just because you cant ( or wont) hear them doesnt mean that 
they are "shuffling or natural noise". I can hear them and other 
people can hear them and that is enough for me. As i said i have been 
involved with the paranormal for many years and this has been a 
problem. If you cant hear what I hear or see what I see doesnt mean 
that im and idiot or faker.
